com.khaledbakhit.api.rslib.ruleset

Class DefaultRulSetVerifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.khaledbakhit.api.rslib.ruleset.RuleSetVerifier
      • com.khaledbakhit.api.rslib.ruleset.DefaultRulSetVerifier

  • public class DefaultRulSetVerifier
extends RuleSetVerifier
    DefaultRuleSetVerifier is the default implementation of RuleSetVerifier abstract class.
    Auto-correct mode may lead to incorrect corrections, especially if all metrics/classifications differ by one character.Use with caution.
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    24/08/2013
    Author:
    Khaled Bakhit
